properties.areaDesc: Lake Michigan Michigan City IN to St. Joseph MI 5 NM offshore to mid-line of lake.; Lake Michigan from St Joseph to South Haven MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Winthrop Harbor to Wilmette Harbor IL 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Wilmette Harbor to Michigan City in 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Wind Point WI to Winthrop Harbor IL 5NM offshore to Mid Lake
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 2:45PM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to around 1 mile at
times.

* WHERE...Southern portions of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING
